Sentencas: Burnout of organic binder and sintering behaviour of yttria doped zirconia electrolyte green tapes were investigated by thermogravimetry and dilatometry.
Titulo: Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis

Sentencas: The burnout which precedes the actual sintering, as well as the sintering itself were described by a mathematical model based on formal kinetics.
Titulo: Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis

Sentencas: Thus, the measured data were reduced to a set of a few parameters which can be easily used to simulate the kinetic behaviour for an arbitrary temperature profile, so that good accordance between prediction and respective measurement was accomplished.
Titulo: Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis

Sentencas: Using rate controlled binder burnout and rate controlled sintering, optimisation of the temperature profile was achieved with respect to time and energy saving.
Titulo: Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis

Sentencas: These results were confirmed by SEM analysis of the microstructure and determination of the electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis
Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis
Modelling and optimisation of solid electrolyte sintering behaviour by thermokinetic analysis
